label: Dark Energy Equation of State w₀
mathematical_goal: Derive w₀ = -1 + 1/b₃ = -23/24 ≈ -0.9583 from G₂ manifold topology, matching DESI DR2 2025 (w₀ = -0.957 ± 0.067) to 0.02σ
theoretical_significance: PM derives w₀ directly from the third Betti number b₃ = 24 of the G₂ manifold using the thawing quintessence model. The formula w₀ = -1 + 1/b₃ emerges from moduli stabilization dynamics where the vacuum energy density scales with topological invariants. This predicts w₀ = -23/24 ≈ -0.9583, consistent with DESI DR2 2025 measurement w₀ = -0.957 ± 0.067 (deviation: 0.02σ). The result indicates dynamical dark energy (thawing quintessence) rather than a cosmological constant (w = -1), with the departure from -1 controlled by the fundamental topological structure of the compactified dimensions.

cosmological_constant.PM_note: PM prediction is consistent with DESI central value

geometry.fundamental_constant: b₃ = 24 (third Betti number of TCS G₂)
geometry.physical_interpretation: Thawing quintessence from G₂ moduli dynamics
geometry.mechanism: Vacuum energy deviation from Λ controlled by compactification topology

derivation_chain: G₂ manifold: b₃ = 24 (third Betti number, counts 3-cycles)
Thawing quintessence: moduli slowly evolve from stabilized minimum
Energy density: ρ_DE ~ Λ(1 - 1/b₃) from topological constraint

comparison_to_v16_1.reason: Thawing model more fundamental than effective dimension approach

implications.thawing_quintessence: Scalar field slowly evolving from minimum
implications.topological_origin: Dark energy properties encoded in G₂ topology
implications.predictive_power: No free parameters - w₀ fixed by b₃ alone
